text: United Nations Security Council Resolution 125 was adopted on September 5, 1957. After examining the application of the Federation of Malaya (now Malaysia) for membership in the United Nations, the Council unanimously recommended to the General Assembly that the Federation of Malaya be admitted. The resolution was adopted unanimously by all 11 members of the Council. ==See also== *List of United Nations Security Council Resolutions 101 to 200 (1953–1965) == References == *Text of the Resolution at undocs.org ==External links== * 0125 Category:Foreign relations of Malaysia 0125 0125 Category:Malaysian Independence Category:1957 in Malaya Category:September 1957 events
title: United Nations Security Council Resolution 125
